Package subsystem.interbank.creditCard

Class CreditCardController

java.lang.Object
subsystem.interbank.creditCard.CreditCardController
public class CreditCardController extends Object
The CreditCardController class provides methods to manage credit card transactions and balances. It interacts with the CreditCardLayer to perform credit card-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CreditCardController getInstance()
      Returns the instance of CreditCardController. If an instance doesn't exist, it creates one.
      Returns:
      The CreditCardController instance.

    • payViaCard

      public Response<Integer> payViaCard(String cardNumber, String cardholderName, String issueBank, int month, int year, String securityCode, Double amount)
      Performs a payment transaction using a credit card.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - The credit card number.
      cardholderName - The name of the cardholder.
      issueBank - The issuing bank of the credit card.
      month - The expiry month of the credit card.
      year - The expiry year of the credit card.
      securityCode - The security code of the credit card.
      amount - The amount to be paid.
      Returns:
      A Response object containing the transaction status and a response message.

    • receiveMoneyViaCard

      public Response<Integer> receiveMoneyViaCard(String cardNumber, Double amount)
      Receives money on a credit card.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - The credit card number.
      amount - The amount to be received.
      Returns:
      A Response object containing the transaction status and a response message.

    • getBalanceFromCard

      public Response<Double> getBalanceFromCard(String cardNumber)
      Retrieves the balance from a credit card.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - The credit card number.
      Returns:
      A Response object containing the balance and a response message.

    • resetCard

      public Response<?> resetCard(String cardNumber)
      Resets the balance of a credit card to its original state.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - The credit card number.
      Returns:
      A Response object containing a response message.
